title: Gamescom Lives! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.31.20
description:
Imran and Greg tackle Gamescom existing in SOME fashion in 2020 and how it could be poised to take over as THE show in the industry.

Time Stamps - 
00:05:00 - Housekeeping
Boss Baby’s Streaming Persona 5 Royal tonight! It’s a 5:30 p.m. PT Q&A stream with Barrett on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Drew Gardiner, Black Jack, The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report   -
00:05:51 - Gamescom Lives!
00:14:20 - Do you think Conventions Such as PAX West or San DIego Comic Con would move into the direction of going digital with their events? - Best Friends Q:RobbyRob
00:20:19 - Mario Update, Andy Robinson @ VG
00:25:03 - Ghost Recon’s Friend Pass: Why Aren’t More Doing This?
00:31:05 - Pokemon Go’s Best Week of 2020, REB @ GIB
00:33:35 - Covid at Kojima Productions, Haydn Taylor @GIB
00:34:18 - Minecraft Dated, Delayed
00:35:24 - Wasteland 3 Delayed Because of COVID, Steve Watts @ GameSpot
00:40:50 - Outer Worlds Switch Launch, Deets
00:42:50 -  Patreon
00:43:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:48:55 - What's your expectations for the "Re-Up" NieR: RepliCant V1.22474487139? - Charles Jakobsen
00:52:40 - Squad Up: Tim(Animal Crossing on Nintendo Switch) SW-6008-0619-8113
00:58:15 - You‘re Wrong
- Post show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary Whitta
